tika-abh08t46:2_0: 1319-21. Idāni ñāṇadassanavisuddhiyā niddese anuppatte sā yassa ñāṇassa anantaraṁ
tika-abh08t46:2_1: uppajjati, taṁ tāva dassento ‘‘ito para’’ntiādimāha. Ito paranti ito anulomañāṇato
tika-abh08t46:2_2: upari. Āvajjaniyaṭhānattāti āvajjanakiccaṁ karontaṁ kiriyamanodhātu viya maggassa
tika-abh08t46:2_3: āvajjanaṭṭhāne ṭhitattā abbohārikameva ubhayavisuddhilakkhaṇābhāvato. Kiñcāpi evaṁ,
tika-abh08t46:2_5: sotasmiṁ, patitattā vipassanā’’ti. Etenassa paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhibhajanaṁ dasseti.
tika-abh08t46:3_0: 1322. Puthujjanesu bhavaṁ pothujjanikaṁ, tadeva gottaṁ ariyehi asammissā puthujjanasamaññāti
tika-abh08t46:3_1: pothujjanikagottaṁ. Ekavaṁsajānañhi samānā samaññā ‘‘gotta’’nti vuccati, gaṁ tāyati
tika-abh08t46:3_2: buddhiṁ, abhidhānañca ekaṁsikavisayatāya rakkhatīti katvā. Vā-saddo vakkhamānatthavikappane.
tika-abh08t46:3_3: Abhibhuyya pavattito gotrabhūti sambandho. Gottaṁ vuccati nibbānaṁ ‘‘ariyo’’ti buddhiyā,
tika-abh08t46:3_4: abhidhānassa ca tāyanato pavattanatoti adhippāyo. Tato bhavatīti tato gottato ārammaṇapaccayato
tika-abh08t46:3_5: bhavati. Iti-saddo cettha hetuttho daṭṭhabbo. Tena yasmā tato bhavati, tasmā gotrabhūti attho.
tika-abh08t46:4_0: 1323-5. Ñāṇadassanavisuddhi eva ñāṇadassanasuddhikaṁ. Taṁ sampādetuṁ panicchatā tena
tika-abh08t46:4_1: bhikkhunā yaṁ aññaṁ kiñcipi kātabbaṁ, taṁ natthīti sambandho. Kasmā natthīti ce āha
tika-abh08t46:5_0: 1326-7. Evaṁ uppannaanulomañāṇassa panassa etehi tīhipi anulomañāṇehi attano balānurūpena
tika-abh08t46:5_1: thūlathūle saccapaṭicchādakatamamhi antaradhāpite sabbasaṅkhāragate cittaṁ na pakkhandati
tika-abh08t46:5_2: , na laggati, padumapalāsato udakaṁ viya patikuṭati pativaṭṭati, sabbaṁ nimittārammaṇampi
tika-abh08t46:5_3: sabbaṁ pavattārammaṇampi palibodhato upaṭṭhāti, athassa sabbasmiṁ nimittappavattārammaṇe
tika-abh08t46:5_4: palibodhato upaṭṭhite dutiyassa vā tatiyassa vā anulomañāṇassa anantaraṁ gotrabhuñāṇaṁ
tika-abh08t46:5_5: uppajjati. Tenāha ‘‘tassā’’tiādi. Paṭhamāvajjanañceva paṭhamābhogatāpi cāti paṭhamāvajjanaṁ
tika-abh08t46:5_6: paṭhamābhogabhūtaṁ. Sakatthe hi ayaṁ tā-paccayoti. Tattha āvajjanaṁ cittasantānassa
tika-abh08t46:6_1: paccayehi. Muddhanti muddhabhūtaṁ. Ekantikatāya ekavārameva ca uppajjanato punarāvattābhāvena
tika-abh08t46:6_2: pana anāvattaṁ. Anāvajjanampi cāti anāvajjanampisamānaṁ. Saññaṁ datvā viyāti ‘‘evaṁ
tika-abh08t46:6_3: uppajjāhī’’ti saññaṁ datvā viya. Anibbiddhapubbanti apadālitapubbaṁ. Viddhaṁsentovāti
tika-abh08t46:6_4: vināsento eva. Jāyatīti nibbattati. Ettha ca imaṁ upamaṁ āharanti – eko kira issāso
tika-abh08t46:6_5: aṭṭhausabhamatte padese phalakasataṁ ṭhapāpetvā vatthena mukhaṁ veṭhetvā saraṁ sannayhitvā
tika-abh08t46:6_6: cakkayante aṭṭhāsi, añño puriso cakkayantaṁ āvijjhitvā yadā issāsassa phalakaṁ abhimukhaṁ
tika-abh08t46:6_7: hoti, tadā tattha daṇḍakena saññaṁ deti. Issāso daṇḍakasaññaṁ amuñcitvāva saraṁ khipitvā
tika-abh08t46:6_8: phalakasatanibbijjhati. Tattha daṇḍakasaññaṁ dento viya gotrabhuñāṇaṁ, issāso viya
tika-abh08t46:6_9: maggañāṇaṁ, daṇḍakasaññaṁ amuñcitvāva phalakasataṁ nibbijjhanaṁ viya maggañāṇassa
tika-abh08t46:6_10: gotrabhuñāṇena dinnasaññaṁ amuñcitvāva nibbānaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā anibbiddhapubbānaṁ
tika-abh08t46:7_2: cāti sabbaverabhayāni. Anekepi ānisaṁseti ratanattaye niviṭṭhasaddhādike ānisaṁse.
tika-abh08t46:8: 1339.Tassevānantaranti tassa anantaraṁyeva. Dvepi tīṇi vāti nātitikkhapaññassa dve, tikkhapaññassa tīṇi phalacittāni.
tika-abh08t46:9_0: 1340-3.‘‘Ajānitvāvadanti te’’ti vatvā tattha kāraṇaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘ekassā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
tika-abh08t46:9_1: Pañcamaṁ maggacittanti imināva chaṭṭhassa abhāvadīpanena ‘‘ekaṁ phalacitta’’nti vadato
tika-abh08t46:10_1: vuccatīti sotāpanno nāma dutiyo ariyapuggaloti vuccati. So devarajjacakkavattirajjādipamādaṭṭhānaṁ
tika-abh08t46:10_2: āgamma bhusaṁ pamattopi hutvā kāmasugatiyaṁ sattakkhattumeva sandhāvitvā saṁsaritvā
tika-abh08t46:12: Na te bhavaṁ aṭṭhamamādiyantī’’ti. (khu. pā. 6.9; su. ni. 232; netti. 115);
tika-abh08t46:13: Rūpārūpalokesu pana na tathā niyamoti ācariyā.
tika-abh08t46:14_0: 1347.Phalādīnanti ādi-saddena pahīnakilesādike saṅgaṇhāti. Tathā ca ‘‘iminā vatāhaṁ
tika-abh08t46:14_1: maggena āgato’’ti paṭhamaṁ maggaṁ paccavekkhati, tato ‘‘ayaṁ me ānisaṁso laddho’’ti
tika-abh08t46:14_2: phalaṁ paccavekkhati, tato ‘‘ime nāma me kilesā pahīnā’’ti pahīnakilese paccavekkhati,
tika-abh08t46:14_3: tato ‘‘ime nāma me kilesā avasiṭṭhā’’ti uparimaggattayavajjhe kilese paccavekkhati,
tika-abh08t46:14_4: avasāne ‘‘ayaṁ me dhammo ārammaṇato paṭividdho’’ti amataṁ nibbānaṁ paccavekkhati.
tika-abh08t46:14_5: Iti sotāpannassa pañca paccavekkhaṇañāṇāni honti. Yathā ca sotāpannassa, evaṁ sakadāgāmianāgāmīnampi.
tika-abh08t46:14_6: Arahato pana avasiṭṭhakilesapaccavekkhaṇaṁ nāma natthi. Evaṁ sabbānipi ekūnavīsati
tika-abh08t46:15_0: 1348-50. Yāsaṁ paccavekkhaṇavasena imāni ñāṇāni pavattanti, tā dassetuṁ ‘‘maggo phalañcā’’tiādimāha.
tika-abh08t46:15_2: vā na vā. Na hi sabbeva tattha samatthā honti. Teneva hi mahānāmo bhagavantaṁ pucchi
tika-abh08t46:15_3: ‘‘ko su nāma me dhammo ajjhattaṁ appahīno, yena me ekadā lobhadhammāpi cittaṁ pariyādāya
tika-abh08t46:15_4: tiṭṭhantī’’tiādi (ma. ni. 1.175). Yogamārabhateti tasmiṁyeva vā āsane nisinno, aparena
tika-abh08t46:15_5: vā samayena kāmarāgabyāpādānaṁ tanubhāvakarāya sakadāgāmimaggasaṅkhātāya dutiyāya
tika-abh08t46:15_6: bhūmiyā adhigamatthāya vipassanāyogaṁ karoti, dutiyabhāvo cassa desanāvasena, uppattivasena
tika-abh08t46:15_7: ca veditabbo. Sampayuttānaṁ pana nissayabhāvena te dhammā bhavanti etthāti bhūmi,
tika-abh08t46:15_8: yasmā vā samānepi lokuttarabhāve sayampi bhavati, na nibbānaṁ viya apātubhūtaṁ, tasmāpi
tika-abh08t46:15_9: ‘‘bhūmī’’ti vuccati. Ñāṇena parimajjatīti tena tenākārena indriyānaṁ tikkhatarataṁ
tika-abh08t46:15_10: sampādetvā, balabojjhaṅgānañca paṭutarabhāvaṁ sādhetvā lakkhaṇattayaṁ tīraṇavasena parimajjati.
tika-abh08t46:16_0: 1351-2. Tattha aparāparaṁ ñāṇaṁ cārento parivatteti. Tenāha ‘‘vipassanāvīthiṁ ogāhatī’’ti.
tika-abh08t46:16_1: Heṭṭhā vuttanayenāti udayabbayañāṇādīnaṁ uppādane vuttanayeneva. Gotrabhussa anantaranti
tika-abh08t46:16_2: ettha gotrabhu viya gotrabhu. Paṭhamamaggapurecārikañāṇañhi puthujjanagottābhibhavanato,
tika-abh08t46:16_3: ariyagottabhavanato ca nippariyāyato ‘‘gotrabhū’’ti vuccati, idaṁ pana taṁsadisatāya
tika-abh08t46:16_4: pariyāyato gotrabhu. Ekaccasaṁkilesavisuddhiyā, pana accantavisuddhiyā ārammaṇakaraṇato
tika-abh08t46:16_5: ca ‘‘vodāna’’nti vuccati. Tenāha paṭṭhāne ‘‘anulomaṁ vodānassa anantarapaccayena
tika-abh08t46:16_7: upādāya aṭṭha gotrabhudhammā samādhivasena uppajjanti, dasa gotrabhudhammā vipassanāvasena
tika-abh08t46:16_8: uppajjantī’’tiādīsu (paṭi. ma. 1.60) gotrabhunāmavaseneva āgataṁ, tasmā idhāpi ‘‘gotrabhussa
tika-abh08t46:16_9: anantara’’nti vuttaṁ gottasaṅkhātanibbānato bhūtanti katvā. Dutiyamaggañāṇavaṇṇanā.
tika-abh08t46:17_0: 1355-7.Yanti yasmā. Sakidevāti ekavārameva. Imaṁ lokaṁ āgantvāti iminā pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu
tika-abh08t46:17_1: cattāro vajjetvā ekova gahito. Ekacco hi idha sakadāgāmiphalaṁ patvā idheva parinibbāyati,
tika-abh08t46:17_2: ekacco idha patvā devaloke parinibbāyati, ekacco devaloke patvā tattheva parinibbāyati,
tika-abh08t46:17_3: ekacco devaloke patvā idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāyatīti ime cattāropi idha na gahitā.
tika-abh08t46:17_4: Yo pana idha patvā devaloke yāvatāyukaṁ vasitvā idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāyati, ayamekova
tika-abh08t46:17_5: idha gahitoti. Antakaro bhaveti dukkhassantakaro bhaveyya, bhave vā antakaro bhavassa
tika-abh08t46:17_6: antakaroti attho. Tatiyāya bhūmiyā pattiyāti sambandho. Byāpādakāmarāgānaṁpahānāyāti
tika-abh08t46:17_7: tesaṁyeva sakadāgāmimaggena tanukarānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ niravasesappahānāya. Tatiyamaggañāṇavaṇṇanā.
tika-abh08t46:18_0: 1363-7. Paṭisandhivasena kāmabhavassa anāgamanato anāgāmī. Tenāha ‘‘tattheva parinibbāyī’’ti.
tika-abh08t46:18_1: Tatthevāti suddhāvāse vā aññattha vā yattha uppanno, tattheva parinibbāyi. Anāvattisabhāvoti
tika-abh08t46:18_2: tasmā lokā idha paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena imaṁ lokaṁ punarāgamanābhāvato anāvattanasabhāvo,
tika-abh08t46:19_1: mahāmoggallāno’’ti. Na hi cūḷakhīṇāsavo nāma atthi. Anuppatto sadattho sakattho,
tika-abh08t46:19_2: pūjattho vā etenāti anuppattasadattho, sadatthoti ca arahattaṁ veditabbaṁ. Tañhi
tika-abh08t46:19_3: attupanibandhanaṭṭhena, attānaṁ avijahanaṭṭhena, attano paramatthaṭṭhena ca attano
tika-abh08t46:19_4: atthattā ‘‘sadattho’’ti vuccati. Khīṇāni dasapi bhavasaṁyojanāni etassāti khīṇasaṁyojano.
tika-abh08t46:19_5: Dakkhiṇaṁ arahatīti dakkhiṇeyyo. Catassopīti sotāpattimaggo sakadāgāmimaggo anāgāmimaggo
tika-abh08t46:19_6: arahattamaggoti catassopi. Visuddhikāmenāti attano visuddhiṁ icchantena. Tapoyeva
